MemoryInfobox.description: 'Courtesan|Hetaerae, with their relative independence and wealth compared to many women in the cities, sometimes became the targets of Thief|thieves and bandits on the roads.'

General_Description: '''Family Trinkets''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra was tasked with delivering a good luck trinket.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra talked to an ''[[Courtesan|hetaerae]]''.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Anything a ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]'' can help you with?''
*'''Woman:''' ''I have a small trinket to send to my brother, to wish him strength in battle. But [[Thief|thieves]] have been targeting ''hetaerae'' in the city and I worry what may happen to me on the journey there.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''So you need me to deliver it?''
*'''Woman:''' ''Right. He'll be waiting for it.''
(Accept – I'll handle it)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take care of it.''
*'''Woman:''' ''Oh, thank you.''
*'''Kassandra:''' Chaire'', stranger.''
Kassandra left the woman and soon found the [[soldier]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Delivery for you. from a ''hetaera''.''
*'''Man:''' ''Oh! Just what I needed. Take this for your trouble, ''misthios''.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
